attributes.action: British citizens must have a vote on yougov on any policies put forward to HOP
attributes.additional_details: YouGov can be used to put new policies on cuts to services or funding decision on and ask us it's people if we agree to changes... It's our country .. It's our decision .. It's our life we are sick of them messing it up and not taking responsibility for it..
attributes.background: British citizens have a right to vote on all policies put through to Houses of parliament via YouGov before a parliamentary vote..we should be given opportunity to vote on all policies so that MP's know how population feels first.

rejection.details:
YouGov is a polling and market research company, and not a public body.

If you would like the Government or Parliament to open up all policy proposals to a public vote, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/113275
